isInactive.description: This field is false by default.
isInactive.name: isInactive

isexternal.description: Check this box if you want this campaign category available for customers to select on online forms.
isexternal.name: isexternal

leadSource.externalId.description: If the Marketing Automation feature is not enabled, references a value in a user-defined list created by going to Setup > Sales > Setup Tasks > CRM Lists. Sets how this customer was referred to the organization. (Note: If the Marketing Automation feature is enabled, the lead source list originates from your list of campaigns.)
leadSource.externalId.name: leadSource.externalId

leadSource.internalId.description: If the Marketing Automation feature is not enabled, references a value in a user-defined list created by going to Setup > Sales > Setup Tasks > CRM Lists. Sets how this customer was referred to the organization. (Note: If the Marketing Automation feature is enabled, the lead source list originates from your list of campaigns.)
leadSource.internalId.name: leadSource.internalId

leadSource.name.description: If the Marketing Automation feature is not enabled, references a value in a user-defined list created by going to Setup > Sales > Setup Tasks > CRM Lists. Sets how this customer was referred to the organization. (Note: If the Marketing Automation feature is enabled, the lead source list originates from your list of campaigns.)
leadSource.name.name: leadSource.name

name.description: Enter the name for this campaign metric.
name.name: name
